name: babel-angular2-app
description: A skeleton Angular 2 app built with babel.

scripts.build: npm run copy && browserify src/app.js -t babelify --outfile public/app.js
scripts.watch: npm run copy && watchify src/app.js -t babelify --outfile public/app.js

author: Shuhei Kagawa <shuhei.kagawa@gmail.com>
